element.name: CAS.ProductId
element.description: A Product's unique identifier within the CAS namespace.

element.name: CAS.ProductName
element.description: A Product's name within the CAS namespace.

element.name: CAS.ProductReceivedTime
element.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time that the Product was received.

element.name: Filename
element.description: The names of the files that represent this product.

element.name: FileLocation
element.description: The locations of the files that represent this product.

element.name: ProductType
element.description: Type of file.

element.name: ProtocolId
element.description: EDRN protocol identifiers associated with this product, i.e., pointers to associated EDRN protocols.

element.name: DatasetId
element.description: A pointer to the eCAS dataset (if any) that this product belongs to.

element.name: SiteName
element.description: Pointers to EDRN sites that provided data encapsulated within this product.

element.name: SiteShortName
element.description: The 4 digit char code of the EDRN site that provided data encapsulated within this product.

element.name: OrganSite
element.description: Pointers to organs that this product contains data about.

element.name: SpecimenType
element.description: Pointers to any associated specimens in a freezer that this product data is associated with.

element.name: InstrumentDetails
element.description: The instrument technology that was used to process, analyze or capture the EDRN data.

element.name: LabAnalyticMethods
element.description: The analytic methods that were used to process, analyze or capture the EDRN data.

element.name: DataStage
element.description: The stage of the EDRN data such as processed or unprocessed.

element.name: ProductDescription
element.description: A description of the product.

element.name: RecommendedSoftware
element.description: Recommended software, if necessary to analyze or view the product data.

element.name: ProductFunction
element.description: Assist in further definition of product type. For example, ROC data, Calibration File, etc.

element.name: DateProductFrozen
element.description: TBD

element.name: ProductTitle
element.description: TBD

element.name: MethodDetails
element.description: TBD
